s1.title: Introduction
s1.p: Avalon is a Server Framework that provides or will provide for central administration, server pooling, and quicker time to market. The framework defines a standard method of piecing together server components and creating a server.

s2.title: Target Audience
s2.p: This documentation describes the care and feeding of the Avalon Phoenix kernel from the point of view of the administrator. It will be expanded as the system becomes more complete.
